note.p: Army surgeon and author. LRCP, Edinburgh, 1859. Assistant surgeon, Bengal Medical Service, 1852; surgeon-major, 1872; deputy surgeon-general, 1877. Superintendent-general of dispensaries and vaccination, Rajpootana (Rajputana), from 1869. Author of medical textbooks. Fellow, University of Bombay. Knighted, 1888.
Indian Medical Gazette 1873, List of contributors, and p. 7
